name: Supah's Solo Adventure
description:
Game was made for Metroidvania Month19. It is unfinished and will probably crash.

Made with Godot 3.5.

The scope was far too large for 100 hours and only just learning python.

Controller should work well but keys are:

w /d - left/right

down  - fast fall

click to attack (sorry)

left/right switches powers, if you have it.

Right now, only one power is available because the others crashed the game.

Sound also crashed the game, so no sound.

good luck
